briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of FK949E in Bipolar Disorder Patients With Major Depressive Episodes
officialTitle: Phase II/III Study of FK949E: Placebo-controlled, Double-blind, Parallel-group Comparative Study and Open-label, Non-controlled Extension Study in Bipolar Disorder Patients With Major Depressive Episodes
summary: In period I, the treatment effect of FK949E was compared with that of placebo in a blind manner in bipolar disorder patients with major depressive episodes. In period II, the long-term safety and efficacy of FK949E was evaluated.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to End of Treatment Period I in Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) Total Score
